name: Linkwarden extension
description: Ulauncher extension for Linkwarden bookmark service

preferences.name: Linkwarden API URL
preferences.description: Enter the API URL of your Linkwarden instance, Example: https://linkwarden.homelab.com/api/v1/links

preferences.name: Linkwarden API Secret
preferences.description: Enter the API Secret found under Profile > Access Token > New Access Token
